import "./landing.css"; import NavBar from "../navbar/navbar.js"; import {Card} from '../gallery/utils.ts'; import Footer from "../footer/footer.js"; import { Button, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import {Pin, Image, CoverText} from "../personal_util/components.js" /*** GLobal Constants ***/ function Landing() { const images = require.context('../media/images', true); const charMap = (size, color, angle, margin = "0") => {return {'size': size, 'color': color, 'angle': angle, 'margin': margin}}; const hello = [ ['h', charMap("8vw", "#ff0303", "-10")], ['e', charMap("8vw", "#00e0ff", "-5")], ['l', charMap("8vw", "#fff", "-3")], ['l', charMap("8vw", "#000", "2")], ['o', charMap("8vw", "#fff", "5")] ] const iAmAhmed = [ ['i', charMap("5vw", "#fff", "5", "15px")], ['am', charMap("5vw", "#05ff00", "-5", "15px")], ['a', charMap("5vw", "#fff", "-3")], ['hme', charMap("5vw", "#039700", "2")], ['d', charMap("5vw", "#000", "5")] ] const computerScientistArtist = [ ['comp', charMap("4vw", "#000", "5")], ['ut', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "-5")], ['er', charMap("4vw", "#000", "-3", "15px")], ['s', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "2")], ['cient', charMap("4vw", "#d0d0d0", "5")], ['ist', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "-5", "15px")], ['|', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "-5", "15px")], ['art', charMap("4vw", "#00e0ff", "5")], ['is', charMap("4vw", "#000", "-5")], ['t', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "5")] ] const welcomeToMySliceOfTheWeb = [ ['we', charMap("4vw", "#bb0909", "5")], ['lcom', charMap("4vw", "#ff0303", "-5")], ['e', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "-3", "15px")], ['to', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "2", "15px")], ['m', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "5")], ['y', charMap("4vw", "#05ff00", "-5", "15px")], ['sli', charMap("4vw", "#05ff00", "-5")], ['ce', charMap("4vw", "#000", "5", "15px")], ['of', charMap("4vw", "#000", "-5", "15px")], ['t', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "5")], ['he', charMap("4vw", "#039700", "5", "15px")], ['we', charMap("4vw", "#039700", "5")], ['b', charMap("4vw", "#fff", "5")] ] const drawings = []; for (let imgNum = 0; imgNum < 6; imgNum++) drawings.push(images(`./drawings/pic${imgNum}.png`)); return ( <>
{/** Intro **/}
); } export default Landing;
